name: Spin Attack Check
author: Avaro
info: This script triggers screen secrets after Link has performed a spin attack.
description: Useful for example when you want to have a guy that only opens Link the way if he's proven he's worthy.
setup: After importing the script, place an FFC with this script on the screen where you want to use it.It triggers secrets, permanently, after Link has performed a spin attack (normal spin attack or hurricane spin doesn't matter).Leave D0 as 0 if you want it to play the default secret sfx (27). Set it to any number above 0 if you want the sfx of that number to play instead. Set it to -1 if you want no sfx to be played.Requires std.zh which comes with ZC.
